page.title: 15A Housing Estate in Linslade
page.content: At 7.30a.m. my Dad leaves for work and most other people go about that time. There is a Community Centre on the estate, where the Youth Club meets.There are two small shops next to the Community Centre, one is a newsagents and the other a small supermarket. There is a school which is over a hill and down a path. It is called Southcott Lower School. There are five years of pupils there. When I play out I go up to the Community Centre and play cricket or football.There is a field round the corner from my house where I play football with my friends. My friends live opposite the field. Down the road there is a little wood where we play war in the camps we make. There are fields behind the wood where wheat and barley are grown.
